title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Sustainable computing for climate solutions (AIM417)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 气候解决方案的可持续计算 (AIM417)
abstract: High Performance Computing (HPC) is crucial for solving complex environmental challenges such as air pollution and extreme weather forecasting, yet HPC workloads are traditionally computationally intensive. This session explores patterns and key AWS services like AWS Batch, ParallelCluster, EC2 Spot Instances, Graviton processors, FSx for Lustre, and Cloudwatch that help optimize the balance between computational performance and environmental sustainability. Attendees will explore a real-world example of how researchers from University of Oxford are using sustainable HPC solutions for community air quality improvement through large-scale geospatial data processing and machine learning.
abstract_cn: 高性能计算 (HPC) 对于解决复杂的环境挑战（如空气污染和极端天气预报）至关重要，然而 HPC 工作负载传统上计算密集度很高。本会议探讨了模式和关键 AWS 服务，如 AWS Batch、ParallelCluster、EC2 Spot Instances、Graviton 处理器、FSx for Lustre 和 CloudWatch，这些服务有助于优化计算性能和环境可持续性之间的平衡。与会者将探索一个真实案例，了解牛津大学的研究人员如何通过大规模地理空间数据处理和机器学习，使用可持续的 HPC 解决方案来改善社区空气质量。

presenter.name: Guyu Ye
presenter.title: Sr. Solutions Architect, AWS Social Responsibility and Impact
